description: The stylish shorts from the Hueco family look equally good in the climbing gym and in everyday life. The resistant and abrasion-proof fabric makes the Hueco Shorts particularly robust. The elasticated material ensures maximum comfort. A drawstring allows precise adjustment of the waistband. The pocket on the right leg is ideal for storing a smartphone and there is also a zipper pocket on the back for your key.
name: Mammut Hueco Shorts - Mens
